item.title: [vow] Chill of the Grave
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Zombie.

Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Draw a card.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Cradle of Safety
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Flash

Enchant creature you control

When Cradle of Safety enters the battlefield,e ncahnted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Enchanted creatures gets +1/+1.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Cruel Witness
item.description:
Creature — Bird Horror

Flying

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, look at the top card of your library. You may put that card into your graveyard.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Dreadlight Monstrosity
item.description:
Creature — Crab Horror

Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)

{3}{U}{U}: Dreadlight Monstrosity can't be blocked this turn. Activate only if you own a card in exile.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Fear of Death
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

Enchant creature

When Fear of Death enters the battlefield, mill two cards. (Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.)

Enchanted creature gets -X/-0, where X is the number of cards in your graveyard.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Repository Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

When Repository Skaab exploits a creature, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Serpentine Ambush
item.description:
Instant

Until end of turn, target creature becomes a blue Serpent with base power and toughness 5/5.

item.title: [vow] Skyward Skaab
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Drake

Flying

When Skyward Skaab enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [vow] Steelclad Spirit
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Defender

Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Steelclad Spirit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.title: [vow] Stitched Assistant
item.description:
Creature — Zombie

Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

When Stitched Assistant exploits a creature, scry 1, then draw a card. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/card-image-gallery/innistrad-crimson-vow

item.description:

• Target opponent exiles two cards from their hand.

item.title: [vow] Bleed Dry
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

item.title: [vow] Blood Fountain
item.description:
Artifact

When Blood Fountain enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

{3}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Blood Fountain: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [vow] Diregraf Scavenger
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Bear

Deathtouch

When Diregraf Scavenger enters the battlefield, exile up to one target card from a graveyard. If a creature card was exiled this way, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [vow] Dread Fugue
item.description:
Sorcery

Cleave {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its cleave cost. If you do, remove the words in square brackets.)

Target player reveals their hand. You may choose a nonland card from it [with mana value 2 or less]. That palyer discards that card.

item.title: [vow] Ancestral Anger

item.title: [vow] Kaya, Geist Hunter
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Kaya

+1: Creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature token you control.

−2: Until end of turn, if one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.

−6: Exile all cards from all graveyards, then create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying for each card exiled this way.

item.description:
Creature — Vampire

Flying

Whenever one or more other creatures with power 2 or less enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [voc] Breathkeeper Seraph
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying, soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)

As long as Breathkeeper Seraph is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "When this creature dies, you may return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep."

item.title: [vow] Cemetery Illuminator
item.description:
Creature — Spirit

Flying

Whenever Cemetery Illuminator enters the battlefield or attacks, exile a card from a graveyard.

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

Once each turn, you may cast a spell from the top of your library if it shares a card type with a card exiled with Cemetery Illuminator.

https://articles.starcitygames.com/news/innistrad-crimson-vow-delivers-blue-new-mythic-rare-spirit-in-cemetery-illuminator/
